name: LYKE_Home_Ramos_Cream_Reclining_Sofa
reviews: Not bad for the price, you get what you pay for. If I had to pay retail for this, I'd be pretty disappointed. Not very sturdy, when we try to move it, the top piece comes off sometimes, but it just clicks right back in. Only major complaint is the back of the couch looks cheap. We had to put a decorative chest behind it to hide the back. If you're using it up against a wall, then it's not a big deal. Comfortable. Color is a little darker than pictured, not nearly as bright/creamy, almost has more of a yellow tone to it, but this could vary depending on color of the room.
description: After a long day come home to the Ramos Reclining sofa by LYKE Home finished in a Cream leather it is the perfect touch to your living area. Padded seats, plush backs and arms provide the ultimate comfort you will need.Type: SofaMaterial: LeatherStyle: ContemporaryAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: CreamStyleContemporaryMaterialLeatherTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorCream
